generalItems.name: Anything else you think I would like

specificItems.name: Dorohedoro, Vol. 11 and above
specificItems.blurb: I have volumes 1-10, but there are 20-something in total so I'd like more of them.

specificItems.name: French Rolling Pin
specificItems.blurb: I want a cylindrical rolling pin that doesn't have the beveled ends. Stainless steel or high-quality plastic preferred over wood.

specificItems.name: Re-usable bowl lids
specificItems.blurb: There are many options available for this kind of thing, either stretch-over lids or silicon discs you simply place on top. Something large enough for some of the larger general-use kitchen bowls we have.

specificItems.name: Iwachu Iron Tamagoyaki Omelette Pan
specificItems.blurb: This is a nice square omelette pan I'd like to get eventually.

specificItems.name: Money for a full-faced mountain bike helmet
specificItems.blurb: I need to get a full-faced mountain bike helmet so I can eventually take a day-trip to a downhill bike park!

specificItems.name: Money for PC upgrade
specificItems.blurb: I'd like to do an upgrade for my desktop computer. It will take me about $1,000 to get it to where I want it. Any cash gifts would be fine.
